items.sentence: I can let you have this for three hundred dollars.
I can stay with you for as long as you want me to.
I want to finish what I\'m doing before I go home.
I still don\'t understand why you don\'t like Tom.
I still haven\'t done what you\'ve asked me to do.
Tom told me he wouldn\'t take up much of our time.
Mary and Alice both used to be Tom\'s girlfriends.
There isn\'t much butter left in the refrigerator.
How did you figure out Tom was the one who did it?
Tom is hoping that he won\'t be chosen to do that.
